instruction: Devise a memory strategy to remember the order of the planets in the solar system.
output: A good memory strategy to remember the order of the planets in the solar system is to create an acronym out of the first letters of the planets: Mercury (M), Venus (V), Earth (E), Mars (M), Jupiter (J), Saturn (S), Uranus (U), Neptune (N). This way, you can easily remember the order: MVEMJSUN.
